Package adris.altoclef

Class BotBehaviour

java.lang.Object
adris.altoclef.BotBehaviour
public class BotBehaviour extends Object
Represents the current behaviour/"on the fly settings" of the bot. Use this to change how the bot works for the duration of a task. (for example, "Build this bridge and avoid mining any blocks nearby")
